titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4919) to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 and the Arms Export Control Act to make improvements to certain defense and security assistance provisions under those Acts, to authorize the transfer of naval vessels to certain foreign countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-874, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4919. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 280.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 584.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/20/2000--Introduced. Waives points or order against the conference report to accompany H.R. 4919 (defense and security assistance).
